column2: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
column3: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

column2: Coronavirus: OMS ihanura abantu kwambara udupfukamunwa
column3: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ryahinduye imvugo, aho rihanura abantu kwambara twa dupfukamunwa mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Iryo shirahamwe mpuzamakungu rimenyesha ko hari amakuru mashasha ryaronse yerekana ko utwo dutambara "dushobora kuzibira impwemu zirimwo umugera ". Hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe mu bice bitandukanye vy'isi bitegeka canke bisaba abanyagihugu kwambara utwo dutambara iyo baramutse basohoka. OMS yahora ivuga ko ata vyemezo vyari bihari vyari gutuma isaba abantu batarwaye kwambara  udupfukamunwa. Muganga Maria Van Kerkhove, arongoye umurwi w'abahinga ba OMS ku biraba Covid-19, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko abanyagihugu basabwa kwambara udupfukamunwa "dukozwe mu dutambara dusanzwe - bivuga ko atari twa dutambara twambarwa n'abaganga", mu gihe bagiye ahantu bikeka ko bashobora kwandurira. OMS yagumye ivuga ko udupfukamunwa twambarwa n'abaganga dukwiye kwambarwa n'abantu barwaye canke abariko barabafasha. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'ubushakashatsi buherutse gukora. Muganga Van Kerkhove ati: "Dusaba ko ibihugu vyohimiriza abanyagihugu bavyo kwambara udupfukamunwa". Aho nyene, OMS ishimangira ko udupfukamunwa ko ari kimwe mu bishobora gutuma ikwirakwira rigabanuka - ariko y'uko abantu batohava bijajara bakadufata nk'urukingo. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS ati: "Udupfukamunwa twonyene ukwatwo sitwo tuzogukingira Covid-19". Gushika ubu, abashika imiliyoni 6.7 kw'isi baramaze kwandura coronavirus, nayo hafi 400.000 bakaba bamaze guhitanwa n'ico kiza kuva cadutse mu mpera z'umwaka uheze, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ishure kaminuza John Hopkins.

column2: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
column3: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

column2: Burundi-CVR: 'Nimba ukuri ari ukuje gutera indyane mu gihugu, ntaco kwoba kumaze', Ndayishimiye
column3: Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko mu gihe "ukuri kwoza gutuma mu gihugu haduka indyane twopfuma tuguheba", yabivugiye mu kiganiro yahaye abanyagihugu kuri uyu wa gatatu, aho yasiguye yongera yishura ku bibazo bitari bike bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Asigura ibijanye n'ukumenya ukuri ku bwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko "kumenya ukuri atari ikibazo", ko ahubwo "kwodufasha kwubaka akahise kacu, abana bacu baze bamenye ikizira n'ikitazira". Ati: "Turi mu bihe vy'ukumenya ukuri, ariko rero, …ni kwaba uko kuri ari ukuje gutuma indyane ziba mu gihugu, uko kuri ntaco kwoba kumaze". Haciye imisi umurwi ujewe kumenya ukuri n'ukunywanisha mu Burundi,  CVR,   utangaje ko ubwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-1973 ari "ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abahutu", ivyateye impari mu Barundi bamwe bamwe, bavuga ko ico cegeranyo gifise aho gihengamiye canke ko bimwe mu bikivugwamwo ari "ikinyoma". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, iyo ukuri kumaze kuboneka haba hasigaye ingene igihugu kigukoresha. Ati: "Mugabo rero hariho abandi baca basimba, bagaca barondera ingene bagukoresha, ivyo bijejwe inzego z'igihugu, zozo zizomenya ingene zigukoresha ziravye ico abenegihugu bazovuga". Yemerera Abarundi ko indongozi zizotegerezwa gukora uko zishoboye kwose "kugira ngo uko kuri kutwubake, kwubake kazoza k'Uburundi, gukure ivyo kwihorana". Akebura ko mu gihe ukuri kutamenyekanye bishobora gutuma ubwicanyi bubandanya. "Dutegerezwa kumenya ko kwica ari icaha gikomeye cane, hanyuma tukakirwaniriza hamwe. Rero uko kuri nti kuje kudusambura, kuje ahubwo kutwubaka". Ku bijanye n'ico cegeranyo ku bwicanyi bwa 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko cashikirijwe inama nshingamateka, iyi nayo ikazogishikana mu rwego nshingwabikorwa rw'igihugu, na rwo ruheze rwiture abize amategeko kugira  bagice irya n'ino, kugira bemeze niba ari icaha mpuzamakungu n'abagikoze. Ku bafise ubwoba kuri iki cegeranyo, Perezida Evariste avuga ati: "Abarundi ni tuve mu bishobisho, nta bwoko bwagize jenoside mu Burundi, nta bwoko bwagize icaha c'ihonyabwoko mu Burundi". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, bamwe mu Barundi bafise ubwoba kuko hamye ingeso yo kujaniranya, hakaba abitirira ikibi kanaka ubwoko kanaka "nk'uko umengo cari igihugu kitagira ubutegetsi". Evariste Ndayishimiye yemeza ko ubutegetsi bw'ico gihe ari bwo bubazwa ubu bwicanyi buteye impari. Ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe yonsigurira ingene hoba umurwi w'abantu wogenda ukagandagura abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, ntihagire ico ubutegetsi bukora ataco buwuziko". "Ni twemere neza ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu bw'ico gihe bwamenje". Avuga ko bamwe mu bari muri bwo batanze ukuri barashinga intahe y'ukuntu vyagenze. Nayo ku bavuga ko ishirahamwe ONU ari ryo ryoba rifise ububasha bwo kwemeza icaha ca jenoside, Perezida Ndayishimiye avyamirira kure kuko "nta na hamwe vyanditse". "Igitabo mpanavyaha c'Uburundi, kirahana neza ivyaha vy'ihonyabwoko, amakungu si yo mucamanza w'Uburundi, ONU si reta y'Uburundi". "Icaha ca jenoside cemezwa n'amategeko mpanavyaha y'Uburundi". Abajijwe nimba abanyaporitike bahunze bagirizwa amabi bashobora kugirirwa ikigongwe, Perezida Ndayishimiye, avuga y'uko bizovana n'ingene igihugu gishobora kuvyakira. Ati: "Igihe Papa Johani Paulo wa kabiri bamurasa, uwamurashe yaramugiriye ikigongwe, mbere araja no kumuraba aho abohewe, ariko ntiyaciye ataha, igihugu nticaciye kimugirira ikigongwe. "Burya rero ibijanye n'ikigongwe, ubanza kuraba ingene igihugu kivyakira, nimba agatima k'ubukoko karavuye muri uyo muntu, kandi nimba ashobora gusubira mu bandi agatekana neza. "Mwarabonye abantu bagiriwe ikigongwe mu baheruka, ubwo nyene baca basubira kwica abantu, basubira gufatwa baja mu gasho. None nk'abo bantu wumva tutagize amakosa kubarekura?" Abajijwe ku bivugwa vy'uko urwego rujejwe igendereza ruhohotera abantu, mbere hakaba hari n'uwuherutse kuhasiga ubuzima, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye nawe avuga ko uwabikoze yamenje kandi ko ategerezwa guhanwa. Avuga ko abakora ivyo bintu bashobora kuba bari muri ba bantu "baja gukora mu mabanga y'igihugu bafise inzigo", bafitiye akarigangamuhogo  abantu. Ati: "Muhora mwumva abapolisi bafata abantu bakabapfunga muri weekend kugira bazorekurwe ku wa mbere. Hariho Abarundi bagifise agakoko mu mitima". Mu misi iheze, hari umunywanyi w'umugambwe CNL yafashwe yagirijwe gutunga inkoho, arasinzikarizwa ubuzima gushika aritaba Imana. Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko yababajwe n'urupfu rwiwe, kandi ko uwabikoze yafashwe kugira ashiwe imbere y'ubutungane. "Uyo muntu yamuhohoteye yaramenje kandi ategerezwa guhanwa bimwe vy'akarorero. Ntituzokwihanganira na rimwe umuntu uwo ari we wese azohohotera uwundi, n'aho azoba yakoze ikibi, agateka kiwe kaguma kubahiriwa". Nayo ku kibazo c'abanyuruzwa, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko bikorwa n'akarwi k'inkozi z'ikibi kihaye kwama gatuntuza abarundi. Avuga ko bariko barahiga abagize ako karwi "kandi hari abamaze gufatwa muri bo, mbere dusanga harimwo n'umupolisi". Avuga ko abakora ubwo bubisha ari ababá bashaka kwerekana ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ari bwo bunyuruza abantu. Ati: "Nico gituma ubona baca bahindukiza, ngo ni uburongozi bw'igihugu. None Uburongozi bw'igihugu bwoba ari bwo bwabikoze bugaca buja guhiga abo bantu?"

column2: UN iragiriza u Burundi na Tanzania gutoteza impunzi z'abarundi
column3: Abahinga ba ONU bajejwe agateka ka zina muntu baratera akamo amareta y'Uburundi na Tanzania kwubahiriza uburenganzira bw'abasavye indaro muri ico gihugu. Bananebagura inkuru zivuga ko hariho impunzi zinyuruzwa, zisinzikarizwa ubuzima, zisubizwa mu Burundi ku nguvu zikongera zigaterwa n'ubwoba. ONU ivuga ko ivyo vyoba bikorwa n'inzego z'igipolisi n'iperereza vya Tanzania bafashanije n'iperereza ry'Uburundi. Bavuga bati : "Uretse amategeko akaze yo kubuza impunzi gucaruka, yashizweho na reta ya Tanzania, impunzi z'abarundi ubu zibayeho mu bwoba bwo kunyuruzwa mw'ijoro n'inzego zijejwe umutekano za Tanzania, zikajanwa mu bibanza batazi canke bagasubizwa mu Burundi. "Abayoboke b'imigambwe itavuga rumwe na reta bahungiye muri Tanzania boba babandanya gukurikiranwa iyo bahungiye." Abo bahinga bavuga kandi ko uko umutekano wifashe mu makambi bidahumuriza, uravye inkuru zivuga ko abajejwe iperereza mu Burundi, bihinduye impunzi, batunga urutoke abantu baba baronderwa, mu nyuma bagaca bahagarikwa n'inzego zijejwe umutekano za Tanzania. Basaba reta y'Uburundi guhagarika gutoteza abanyagihugu harimwo n'abo bariko bararondera gukingirwa n'amakungu mu gihugu ca Tanzania. Abo bahinga ba ONU bavuga bati : "Hari impunzi zemeje ko hari abatwarwa n'igipolisi ca Tanzania, bakanyuruzwa hanyuma bagasinzikarizwa ubuzima imbere y'uko birukanwa muri ico gihugu canke bategekwa gushira umukono ku rupapuro rwemeza ko bashaka gutahuka ku gushaka. "Bamwe babazwa kuvyerekeye kuba mu migwi igwana,  gutunga ibigwanisho, ibikorwa bakora mw'ikambi, rimwe na rimwe bakakwa amahera kugira barekurwe." Muri urwo rwandiko bavuga kandi ko bamwe mu mpunzi bishwe inyuma yo kunyuruzwa n'abajejwe umutekano ba Tanzania. Amakenga ku mutekano wabo, watumye bamwe mu mpunzi bemera gutaha, atari kugushaka ahubwo kubera ubwoba. Abo bahinga barangiza icegeranyo cabo bavuga ko bibabaje kubona kuva mu 2020 reta yavuze ko hari amatohoza ariko arakorwa ku bantu banyuruzwa, ariko gushika ubu akaba ata co arashikako. Reta ya Tanzania ngo irazi neza uko ivyo bintu vyifashe, ikaba isabwa kugira ico ikoze kugira bihagarare. Nta co reta y'Uburundi n'iya Tanzania bari bashikiriza ku mugaragaro kuri ibi vyashikirijwe n'abahinga ba ONU.

column2: Nijeriya niyo isa n' isigaye mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abagore
column3: Imirwi ya Afrika mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abagore ntihagaze neza aho ibintu bigeze gushika ubu. Ibihugu vya Nijeriya, Kameruni na Afrika y'Epfo nivyo vyaserukiye umugabane wa Afrika muri iryo higanwa ririko ribera mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. Imirwi ya Afrika y'Epfo na Kameruni yoyo ivyayo ntivyoroshe kuko mu mirwi birimwo ata nota na rimwe vyigeze bironka, bigasigura ko batigeze batsinda n'urukino na rumwe. Amaso yose asigaye yerekeje cane kuri Nijeriya mu murwi A ikaba iri kumwe n'ibihugu vy'Ubufaransa, Noroveje hamwe ka Koreya y'Ubumanuko. Nijeria iri mu mwanya wa gatatu inyuma y'Uburafansa bufise amanota atandatu, bugakurikirwa na Noroveje hamwe na Nijeriya nyene,  vyompi bifise amanota atatu atatu, ariko Noroveje ikaba ifise ibitsindo vyinshi, mu gihe Nijeriya yoyo ifise ideni ry'igitsindo kimwe. Koreya y'Epfo yoyo ifise ubusa. Rero, Nijeria isigaje guhura n'Ubufaransa. Ari nka hamwe yovyifatamwo neza igatsinda urwo rukino, irafise amahirwe yo kubandanya, ariko bikava ku kungene ibintu bizogenda hagati ya Koreya y'Ubumanuko na Noroveje. Mu biharuro vya hafi, kugira ngo Nijeria ibandanye, ni uko itsinda Ubufaransa canke bakanganya, hanyuma Koreya y'Epfo nayo igategerezwa gutsinda Noroveje. Mu gihe yoguma mu kibanza ca gatatu, voyvana n'ingene ibintu vyoba bihagaze kugira ngo ibe mu mirwi myiza iri mu bibanza vya gatatu. N'aho ivya Kameruni bitoroshe, ari nka hamwe yotsinda urukino rwayo rwo ku wa kabiri, irashobora kubandanya kuko ni iya gatatu mu murwi E n'amanota ubusa, ariko ikagira ideni ry'ibitsindo bitatu. Vyovana n'ingene iyindi mirwi iri mu bibanza vya gatatu ihagaze. Ni inkino zizobera ica rimwe ejo ku wa mbere isaha 16 mu masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda. Muri iryo higanwa, uno munsi mu murwi F, ibihugu ca Suwede na Tayilandi biratana mu mitwe isaha indwi mu masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda, mu gihe Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziza gutana mu mitwe na Shili isaha icumi. Mu zindi nkino, igihugu ca Ukraine caraye gitahukanye igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi rihuza imirwi nserukirabihugu y'abatarenza imyaka 20 ku ruhande rw'abagabo, gitsinze igihugu ca Koreya y'Epfo ibitsindo 3-1. Muri iryo higanwa, Afrika yari yaserukiwe n'ibihugu vya Senegali, Nijeriya, Mali na Afrika y'Epfo. Igihugu ca Senegali nico cinanase kirashika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma (Quart de finale), mu gihe Nijeriya na Mali bitarenze igice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma (8e de finale) bimaze kurengana igice c'ugukuranamwo mu mirwi (phase de groupes).

column2: Iran 'iriko irasenyura' igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kubera imyiyerekano
column3: N﻿a Siavash Ardalan & Marita Moloney BBC Persian Umushikirizamanza mukuru w’igihugu avuga ko igipolisi kijejwe inyifato, ari naco kijejwe kwubahiriza itegeko rya Islam rijejwe inyambaro muri Irani, kiriko kirasenyurwa. Amajambo ya Mohammad Jafar Montazeri, n’aho ataremezwa n’ibindi bisata, yashikirijwe mu birori vyariko biba ejo ku wa Mungu. Irani imaze amezi atari make mu myiyerekano yaturutse ku rupfu rw’umugore yari akiri muto yapfiriye mu gasho. Mahsa Amini yari yapfunzwe n’igipolisi kijejwe inyifato camwagiriza ko yahonyanze amabwirizwa ajanye no kwitwikira. Montazeri yari mw’ikoraniro ry’amadini igihe abazwa niba igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kiriko kirasamburwa. Yavuze ati: "Igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ntaco gisa gisana n’ubutungane kandi carugawe kuva aho catanguriye”. Iki gipolisi kigenzurwa n’ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati, ntikigenzurwa n’ubutungane. Ku wa gatandatu, Montazeri yabwiye kandi inama nshingamateka ya Irani ko ibwirizwa ritegeka abagore kwambara wa mwambaro wa hijab rigiye kwihwezwa. Ariko n’aho igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kiriko kirasamburwa ntibisigura ko iri tegeko rimaze imyaka mirongo rizoca rihinduka. Imyiyerekano irongowe n’abagore, yiswe “imigumuko” n’abategetsi, ikwiragiye muri Irani kuva Amini  yari afise imyaka 22 apfiriye mu gasho ku wa 16 z’ukw’icenda, inyuma y’imisi itatu ahagaritswe n’igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ku mugwa mukuru Tehran. Urupfu rwiwe rwabaye intandaro y’aka kaguma ariko kandi rwaje rukurikira uburakari bwari busanzwe mu gihugu butewe n’ubukene, ubushomeri, ubusumbasumbane, akarenganyo n’igiturire. Mu gihe vyokwemezwa, isamburwa ry’igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ryoba ryerekana ko ubutegetsi bwemeye impinduka ariko nta cemeza ko ico conyene coba kimaze kugira ngo imyiyerekano ihagarare, aho abari muri yo bagiye baturira ibitambara vyo kwitwikira mu mutwe. Mu kiganiro Newshour ca BBC, umugore umwe w’umunya-Irani yavuze ati: "Kubona reta yafashe ingingo yo gusenyura igipolisi kijejwe inyifato ntibisigura ko imyiyerekano ihagaze. "N’aho reta yovuga ko kwambara hijab ari ku gushaka kw’umuntu ntibihagije. Abanyagihugu barazi ko ata kazoza ka Irani igifise reta nk’iyi ku butegetsi. “Tugiye kubona ingene abanyagihugu b’ingeri zitandukanye za Irani, baba ba ntahompagaze canke abakigendera ku mico ya kera, baza gushigikira abagore bariko bararwanira uburenganzira bwabo”. Uwundi mugore nawe ati: "Twebwe, abari mu myiyerekano, ntitukirajwe ishinga na hijab. Tumaze imisi 70 dutembera tutayambaye. "Tubona impinduka. Hijab niyo yabaye intango kandi nta kindi dushaka kindi atari urupfu rw’umukuru w’igihugu atwaza umukazo n’ihinduka ry’ubutegetsi”. Ibinyamakuru vya reta ya Irani vyahakanye amakuru avuga ko igipolisi kijejwe inyifato kiriko kirasaburwa, nk’uko bivugwa na CNN. Imboneshakure ya reta Al-Alam yoba yatangaje ko ibinyamakuru vyo mu mahanga vyerekana ko amajambo ya Montazeri avuga ko "Irani yasubije umugongo inyuma ku kibazo ca hijab n’ukwicisha bugufi, kandi ko vyavuye ku migumuko iheruka”. "Ariko nta mutegetsi n’umwe wa Irani aratangaza ko igipolisi kijejwe inyifato casambuwe”. Umushikiranganji wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ajejwe imigenderanire Antony Blinken avuga ko ari nka hamwe Irani yosambura igipolisi kijejwe inyifato coba ari “ikintu ciza” anashimagiza “ubutwari budasanzwe bw’urwaruka rwa Irani, cane cane abagore, bafashe iya mbere muri ino myiyerekano”. Blinken avuga ati: "Nimba ubutegetsi hari ukuntu bwishuye ibisabwa muri iyo myiyerekano, iki coba ari ikintu ciza”. Kuva habaye impinduka za ki-Islam mu 1979 muri Irani, iki gihugu cagiye kigira integuro zitandukanye z’“igipolisi kijejwe inyifato”, ariko ikiriho ubu – kizwi nka Gasht-e Ershad – nico nyamukuru muri kino gihe kijejwe guhagararira ikurikizwa ry’itegeko rya Islam rijejwe inyifato muri Irani. Catanguye gukizura mu 2006 mu ntumbero yo kwubahiriza ibwirizwa rigenga inyambaro, ritegeka abagore kwambara impuzu ndende rikabuza kwambara ikaburuta, amajinisi (jeans) atabaguye hamwe n’izindi mpuzu zifatwa ko zitiyubashe.

column2: Kenya-Ruto: Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu aravuga ku kubuzwa urugendo
column3: Icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya William Ruto avuga ko ingingo  y'abategetsi yo kumubuza   gufata urugendo rwo kuja mu  gihugu kibanyi ca Uganda ari integuro yo kumutera umutima mubi nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu no kubangamira ivyo yifuza gushikako muri poritike. Mu kiganiro n'iradiyo yo muri Kenya (Inooro FM) mu gitondo co kuri uyu wa gatatu, William Ruto yavuze ko muri kahise yari amaze gufata ingendo z'akazi canke ziwe bwite ata ntambamyi. Yasiguye ko urugendo rwiwe rwari rugamije kwigira ku kigega c'ubutunzi muri  Uganda mu ntumbero y'umugambi w'ubutunzi  aherutse gutanguza wa 'Bottoms Up' - ugamije guteza imbere ubuzima bw'abantu baronka amikoro make nk'inzira yo kuzamura ubutunzi bwa Kenya. Abajijwe igituma umukuru w'igihugu ata na kimwe yari azi kuri urwo rugendo, Ruto yaciye yigovyora mu kubaza ngo: ''Urazi neza ko umukuru w'igihugu atarwo yari azi?' Harun Aydin ajemwo gute? Ruto yabandanije avuga ko mu myaka icenda amaze ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu atari bwigere asabwa kubanza gusaba uruhusha ku ngendo ziwe zo hanze  y'igihugu, aca anibaza igituma ivyo bishitse ubu. Ruto  yanatanze umuco ku muntu aturuka muri Turkiya, Harun Aydin yari  ku rutonde rw'abo bari kujana muri urwo  rugendo. Yavuze ko Aydin ari umugwizatunga afise imitahe muri Kenya, akaba anashaka kwagurira ibikorwa vyiwe muri Uganda na Tanzania. Umwidondoro n'ubutumwa bw'uwo mugwizatunga vyatumye hari ibibazo vyibazwa biranavugwa cane mu binyamakuru bitandukanye mu gihugu. Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yavuze ko ari ''ugusara hamwe na poritike itagira agaciro'' gufata uwo munyamahanga nk'uwokekwa kuba uwukora iterabwoba  ata kindi kibitumye atari uko yari amuherekeje. Ku wa mbere, inyuma yo kurindira amasaha   atatu kugira yemerewe gufata urugendo, icegera c'umukutu w'igihugu yahavuye abuzwa kwurira indege yo kuja muri Uganda. Amategeko ya reta ya Kenya asaba abakozi  bakuru  ba reta gusaba uruhusha umukuru w'akazi ka reta imbere yo  gufata ingendo zo  mu bindi bihugu - ariko kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu gufata urugendo ntaho  vyari bwigere  biba. Umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta n'icegera ciwe ntibagifitaniye ubucuti bari bafitaniye bagitangura amabanga yo kurongora igihugu mu 2013. Ubwo bucuti bwabo bwatosekaye kuva umunsi Prezida Uhuru Kenyatta akorana mu minwe n'uwutavuga  rumwe na reta Raila Odinga mu 2018. Kuva ico gihe icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yaciye aba nk'uwushizwe ku ruhande mu bikorwa vy'icese vya reta. Umutegetsi wo muri reta ya Uganda Duncan Abigaba, yari asanzwe ariwe ahuza ibikorwa vy'urugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu,  yemereye BBC ko  vy'ukuri Ruto yari yitezwe muri Uganda mu butumwa bwiwe bwite. Yasiguye ko Ruto hari inyungu arondera mu gisata c'uburimyi bw'urudandazwa no gukorera ku mugambi wiwe wo  kuri kaminuza ya Makerere wo gushinga igisata c'ivyigwa vy'uburongozi, the Dr.William Samoei Ruto Centre for Leadership. Mu kwezi guheze icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yahagarariye itanguza rw'uruganda rw'urucanco muri Uganda ku butumire bwa prezida Yoweri Museveni. Ariko ubushikiranganji bwa Uganda bujejwe imigenderanire bwavuze ko ata rugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya bwari buzi. Ministre wa reta ajejwe imigenderanire, Oryem Okello yasiguye ko urwo rugendo rutamenyeshejwe ubushikiranganji bwiwe kandi ko n'abakira abashitsi batari biteguriye umuzo wiwe.

column2: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
column3: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

column2: Kurwara amano biturutse kuri Covid: Icigwa kirabisigura
column3: Abahinga mu bumenyi (science) bemeza ko bashobora gusigura igituma abantu bamwe bamwe banduye Covid baheza bagahurirwa canke bagafurutira ku mano canke ku ntoke. Guhurirwa canke gufurutira ku mano bisa n'uko ari imwe mu ngaruka z'umubiri uba  wafashe inzira yo kurwana kugira wivune umugera. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko batoye neza na neza ibice vy'indinganizo y'umubiri yo kwigwanira bigira uruhara muri ivyo bishikira amano. Ivyatowe, biri muri  British Journal of Dermatology - ikinyamakuru co mu Bwongereza candikwamwo ibijanye n'indwara z'urukoba (uruhu) -  bishobora gufasha gutora imiti yo kworohereza amano. Ni iki kurwara amano bitewe na Covid? Bishobora gushika ku myaka iyari yo yose, ariko akenshi bikarira abana n'abayabaga (abangavu). Kuri bamwe nta bubabare bitera, ariko uko gufurutira gushobora kubabaza kandi kugatera kwiyagaza cane no kuvyimba. Sofia, w'imyaka  13 aba muri Ecose (Scotland) , vyageze aho bihakwa kumunanira gutambuka canke kwambara ibirato igihe yarwara amano biturutse kuri Covid mu minsi iheze. Yageze aho yifashisha intebe ry'abagendana ubumuga canke abarwaye badashobora kwigendera  (wheel chair/chaise roulante) iyo yaba ashaka kuja kure. Igice kirwaye, - akenshi amano, ariko rimwe na rimwe n'intoke - gishobora guhishira. Hari n'abavyimba bakababara canke urukoba rukagangatara.  Hashobora kuza  n'amashira. Hari ababimarana amezi, abandi amayinga. Akenshi, nta kimenyetso na kimwe  bagira mu bisanzwe biranga indwara ya Covid, nk'inkorora idahera,  , ubushuhe no kutamoterwa canke kutumva igisosa canke ikurura. Kubera iki bishika? Ibiherutse gutorwa muri ico cigwa , bishingiye ku bipimo vy'amaraso n'urukoba , vyerekana ko hari ibice bibiri vy'indinganizo y'umubiri yo  kwirwanira bishobora kuba bfise uruhara. Vyompi bizanamwo inzira umubiri ukoresha mu kurwanya umugera. Imwe ni proteine igwanya umugera yitwa interferon y'ubwoko bwa mbere, hanyuma hari n'ubundi bwoko  bw'umusirikare w'umubiri yihenda akarwanya  uturemangingo bwite tw'umuntu, aho kurwanya uwo mugera wonyene. Uturemangingo turi ku nzira  zitwara amaraso ahaba harwaye natwo tugira uruhara nk'uko bivugwa n'abashakashatsi bo kuri kaminuza ya Paris mu Bufaransa. Abashakashatsi bize abantu 50 bikekwa kuba barwaye amano bitewe na Covid ku mpeshi ya 2020, n'abandi 13 bari bafise ibimenyetso bisa navyo ariko vyo  ataho bihuriye na Covid kuko vyabaye imbere cane y'uko ikiza ca Covid caduka. Bizeye ko ivyatowe bizofasha abarwaye n'abaganga  gutahura ibishikira amano. Umuganga avura indwara z'ibirenge mu Bwongereza Dr Ivan Bristow  avuga ko kenshi - guhurirwa canke gufurutira bitewe n'ibicurane canke ku bantu bafise ingorane z'itembera ry'amaraso - birikiza vyo nyene. Ariko hari n'igihe bikenerwa ko hakoreshwa amavuta yo kuhasiga canke imiti. Avuga ati "ubwo ikibitera cemejwe bizofasha kumenya ingene bivurwa neza gusumba". Avuga ko indwara zifata urukoba kubera ingaruka za Covid zishobora kuza haheze igihe umuntu yayirwaye bikomeye no ku bantu ata bindi bimenyetso bagaragaje, gutyo isano na Covid ntiryama rihari.

column2: Kuki Uburundi buza imbere mu bihugu  bikenye cane kw’isi?
column3: Reta y’Uburundi ikwiye kuva mu majambo ikaja mu bikorwa kugira ngo ishobore kwikura mu kabaregwa ko kwitwa igihugu gikenye kurusha ibindi kw’isi, niko Faustin Ndikumana, umukuru w’ishirahamwe PARCEM, ahanura. Ibanki y’isi yose iheruka gusohora icegeranyo c’umwaka wa 2021 ku butunzi n’imibereho y’abanyagihugu gishira Uburundi mu kibanza c’inyuma, ivyatumye benshi bongera kwihweza kw’iterambere ry’Uburundi. Mu kiganiro na BBC, Ndikumana avuga ko imwe mu ngorane nyamukuru Uburundi bufise ari igiturire, akavuga ko mbere ‘ivyo kukirwanya biriko birasubira inyuma ugereranije n’uko vyari bimeze kera’. Mu gihe umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yiyemeje kurwanya igiturire, Ndikumana abona ko ubutungane kuri we ari inzitizi ikomeye. Ati: “Agerageza gute kukirwanya mu gihe ubutungane butariko burakora. Ugushaka ndavyumva, mugabo ubutungane butariko burakora, ntashobora kuvuga ngo uriko urarwanya igiturire”. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe ryishinze gukangurira Abarundi guhindura ingendo abona ko Uburundi budashobora guterimbere mu gihe hakiri ibihushane iyo hageze gushira mu ngiro imigambi y’iterambere. Iki cegeranyo c’ibanki y’isi yose ku mwimbu rusangi mu gihugu (Produit National Brut, PIB) ku muntu mu 2021, cerekana ko Uburundi buza mu kibanza ca 195 kuri 196 aho Umurundi umwe aronka USD 240 gusa ku mwaka wose. Ndikumana avuga ko bapima ibi bisunze “umwimbu wimburwa mu gihugu kanaka kuko niwo uba werekana ubutunzi igihugu kiba gifise, hanyuma bagaca baraba abanyagihugu ingene bangana, umwimbu cimbura mu bisata bitandukanye ugaca ugabanganywa ku banyagihugu bakibamwo, baca baraba rero ico umunyegihugu umwe umwe wese yoba aronka”. “Ni nk’uko wofata urugo kanaka rurimwo umugore n’umugabo n’abana icenda nk’akarorero, ugaharura ivyo bimbura ku kwezi, amahera baronka ku kwezi, ugaca uyagabura rero na cumi na rimwe, ari ho rero uca ubona amahera umuntu umwe umwe muri urwo rugo ashobora kuronka ku kwezi”. “Urumva n’ingo zirasumbana, hariho ingo zimbura vyinshi. Amahera yinjira ari menshi. Uko muza kuyagabura muri bake, niko ukubaho neza guca kwiyongera. Iyo muyagabura muri benshi nayo ari make, ubukene buca bwiyongera”. Ku ruhande rw’Uburundi, Faustin Ndikumana abona ko Uburundi bwimbura bike ariko bugategerezwa kugaburira abantu benshi, bigatuma bwama buboneka ko bukenye. Uburundi ni igihugu kibeshejweho ahanini n’uburimyi, ibiharuro bikerekana ko 90% ari bo babeshejweho n’isuka. Icegeranyo c’ikigo ISTEEBU kijejwe kwegeranya ibiharuro giherutse gusohora icegeranyo co mu mwaka wa 2019-2020 cerekana ko abarundi 40% bashobora kumara umusi wose badafunguye. Ibi biri uku mu gihe abarongoye igihugu bavuga ko umwimbu ari wose. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka ivyaranguwe n’ubushikiranganji butandukanye mu gice ca kabiri c’umwaka uheze hari mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze nyene ari nawo iki cegeranyo cerekeye,  umushikiranganji wa mbere Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni  yavuze ko muri ico gihe honyene igihugu cari gifise amatoni menshi y’umusesekara ku mwibu w’ibigori. Ndikumana abona ko reta n’abakora ivyegeranyo nk’ibi badahuza kubera reta yoyo ikunda gukoresha imvugo ya poritike. Ati: “Wewe uri mu mabanga, bavuze uko ibintu bimeze birashobora kutakunezera kuko bica vyerekana ko umengo utariko uratunganya ibintu neza. “Imvugo ya poritike sico kimwe n’iy’abahinga, ni naco gituma turiko turasubirira n’inyuma, umunyeporitike wewe yivugira poritike aho kuraba ivyo abahinga bavuga”. Mu gusigura ingorane Uburundi bufise zituma bwama buri inyuma mu butunzi, Faustin Ndikumana afatira ku gitabo ishirahamwe ryiwe riherutse gusohora, aho ryihweza imyaka 60 Uburundi bumaze bwikukiye, n’imyaka ibiri y’ubutegetsi bwa Evariste Ndayishimiye. Muri iki gitabo, yerekana ko imigambi itegurwa ariko ko, iyo hageze kuyishira mu ngiro, “umengo hariko hakorwa ibihushane n’ivyategerezwa kuba biriko birakorwa kugira dushikire intumbero y’iterambere”. Asigura bimwe muri ibi bihushane biri muri iki gitabo, ica mbere ciyongera ku giturire avuga ko “tugomba guterimbere mu gihe tuvuga ko Uburundi bwikwiye kandi ivyegeranyo vyerekana ko ari ubwanyuma k’isi mu bihugu bitunze”. Ati: “Uwuja gukira indwara arayirata, none wewe nimba urwaye indwara, ntiwemere ko uyirwaye, wumva uzoyikira gute? Banza wemere ko ukenye”. Imvo ya kabiri ashikiriza abona ko igihugu kigomba  gutera imbere mu gihe atanzira irashe yo kugiteza imbere ihari ifatiye ku citegererezo c'uko ahandi bigenda. Ati: “Turagenda tukandika ibitabo, ngo plan national de developpement, tukandika, tugakora amanama, ngo dushaka gufata intumbero mugabo izo recommendations tugaca tubika. “Gushika ubu nta kintu na kimwe ca programme-vision usanga reta iriko irakorerako”. Ariko rero, hano ntabona ibintu kumwe na reta ufatiye ku vyo umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yabwiye abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze, ari nawo urabwa n’uru rutonde rw’Ibanki y’isi yose, aho yemeza ko integuro ya reta y’igice ca kabiri yakozwe neza mbere hisunzwe uburyo buvuye hagati mu gihugu, akavuga ko ari na ko vyagenze mu gice ca mbere. Yavuze kandi ko n’ibikorwa bishika 290 vyaranguwe neza hisunzwe integuro ya reta kandi ku rugero rwa 79% ku bushikiranganji bwayiranguye ku rugero ruto, be no kuri 97% ku bushikiranganji bwavyitwayemwo neza gusumba ubundi.  Yemeza ko muri rusangi imigambi reta yari ifise yashizwe mu ngiro ku rugero rwa 88%, mu gihe mu gice ca mbere yaranguwe ku rugero rwa 81%. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yaremeje ko ubutunzi bw’igihugu muri ico gice bwagabanutse kubera ikiza karanda ca Covid-19, mbere ko hari n’ibindi bikorwa vyari bitegekanijwe bitashoboye kuranguka. Imvo ya gatatu atanga, avuga ko Uburundi budashobora gutera imbere mu gihe gutanga akazi hatisungwa ubushobozi n’ubumenyi. Ati: “Wewe uvuga ko ushaka gutera imbere gute udashira imbere incabwenge, abashoboye akazi, ubushakashatsi ngo ubushire imbere, mu nzego nyinshi ugasanga abantu bariko bahabwa amabanga badakurikiza ubushobozi, mu gihe ubu ata n’ibigo vy’ubushakashatsi bihari...none wotera imbere gute”? Ikindi gihushane yerekana, ni uko igihugu kigomba gutera imbere “mu gihe ata buryo buhari bwo kuzana amafaranga mvamakungu mu gihugu kugira afashe mukuzibira ikinogo c’amafaranga Uburundi budafise kandi yongere afashe mw’iboneka ry’amafaranga y’agaciro”. Ati: “Mbega iryo terambere uzorironka gute? Uzokoresha amarundi? N’aho worara urayafyatura, ukayarwiza muri BRB ntaco azokumarira”. PARCEM ibona ko amasoko yashobora gutuma igihugu kironka aya mafaranga asa n’ayadakora neza. Ati: “... raba n’ikawa yasubiye inyuma, icayi casubiye inyuma, igisata c’ubukerarungendo ntitugiteza imbere kugira ngo bazane amadevises, raba n’amafaranga y’agaciro yovuye mu nzahabu n’ubutare urabona ko vyanse ...none ushaka gutera imbere gute?” “Nta barwizatunga bazana imitahe mu gihugu; kwaka ingurane ntibikunda kuko usanga badashobora kwizera inzego, badashobora kuzizera ku buryo boziha ingurane y’amafaranga aboneka”. Ikindi gihushane PARCEM ibona gihagaze kw’ikoreshwa ry’amafaranga ya reta ibona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: “Wewe woza gutera imbere gute mu gihe n’ingene reta ikoresha amafaranga ata muco urimwo, umengo amafaranga akoreshwa mu kanywababo, amafaranga adakurikiza imigambi y’iterambere izwi, amafaranga atwarirwa mu gifuri, za cour des comptes zitayakontorora?”. Mu mwaka uheze wa 2021, Prezida Ndayishimiye yumvikanye anegura bikomeye abo mu nzego zitandukanye n'abamufasha imirimo y'igihugu abagiriza  kuba aribo batuma ibintu bitagenda neza mu gihugu. Ni mu gihe yaheruka “kuririra imbere” y’abacamanza kw'izina ry'abenegihugu, aho yavuga ko batakironka ubutungane bubereye kubera abo bacamanza bamunzwe n'ibiturire. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe rihamagarira abantu guhindura ingendo abona ko umukuru w'igihugu afise utwigoro kandi ko n’amajambo ashikiriza atanga icizere, ariko ko abari musi yiwe batamufasha.

column2: Gasape: Urubuga hwaniro rwa mbere rutangujwe n'Umurundi
column3: Umurundi Saxe Perry Gateka asanzwe arongoye Radio Humuriza FM aheruka gutanguza urubuga hwaniro, rushobora kuba ari rwo rwambere rutangujwe n'umuntu ava muri ico gihugu. Urwo rubuga rukora co kimwe n'izindi zisanzwe zimenyerewe nka Facebook canke Twitter, aho abarwiyandikishako basangira amakuru yanditse, amafoto canke za video, ku buryo bwihariye bagashirako n'amajwi. Aho yavugana na BBC, Saxe Perry yavuze yuko yashatse kugira urubuga hwaniro rukora nk'izindi zihasanzwe mbere ngo rukagira ico ruzirushije. Yagize ati: "... nagerageje kwihweza izindi mbuga dusanzwe dukoresha nka za Facebook n'izindi, mugabo nkabona ko ari ibintu bikomeye cane umuntu atoshikako. WhatsApp igiye kwibandaniriza n'impinduka n'aho uwu mugambi wayo wateye induru Australia yashyizeho itegeko ryo gutuma Google na Facebook biriha amakuru Biden, ikibazo kuri Zuckerberg na Facebook "... naragize ivyigwa vya multimedia mu buhinga bwa kure ngerageje kuri internet, hanyuma ntangura gukora kugira nshobore kwihanga abantu b'abanyamahanga... nagize nti nshaka kwipima ku bihangange vya kure bikomakomeye.." Abajijwe ico urwo rubuga rwiwe rusumvya izindi, Saxe Perry yatanze akarorero avuga ko ku zindi mbuga nka Facebook canke Youtube udashobora gushirako amajwi yonyene, ariko ku rubuga rwiwe Gasape ivyo ngo birashoboka. Ku basanzwe bakoresha  Facebook na Youtube, urashobora gushirako ifoto canke video, ariko amajwi yonyene ukwayo, atari kumwe n'amashusho, ntibikunda. Ku kibazo co kumenya abaza ku rubuga Gasabe abo ari bo n'ico baba barondera, Saxe Perry yavuze   yuko ataramemya neza abaruzako abo aribo. Yagize ati: "...[runo rubuga] rushobora kuba ruriko rurakoreshwa  n'abantu bari hafi ya miriyoni zitatu. Rero sinovuga ngo ni Abarundi gusa, ariko ico nizera ni uko benshi muri bo ari Abarundi. "Ariko usivye ko harimwo n'abanyamahanga kuko turamaze kubona abantu basaba nk'ivyo twita 'ama verification y'ama page yabo', tugasanga abaturungikiye ivyangombwa vyabo ni abazungu, ni abanyamahanga. "Rero novuga yuko muri rusangi ari abantu bari kw'isi yose barukoresha... sinagomvye ko runo rubuga rwitwa urw'Abarundi gusa, ni nayo mpamvu rutiswe Gasape.bi, rwiswe Gasape.com..." Saxe Perry yamye ari umwana akerebutse. Mu mwaka wa 2005, afise imyaka 14 y'amavuko, akoresheje utwuma atoraguye hirya no hino, yarahinguye insamirizi (radio transmitter), ico gihe aca atangura kumenyekana no gushika ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aho niho yahereye ashinga Radio Humuriza FM ubu yumvikana mu ntara zishika icenda zo mu Burundi. Radio Humuriza FM mbere yahavuye ikorana na BBC Gahuzamiryango, icemerewe gukorera mu Burundi, aho yaza iracisha amakuru yayo kuri Humuriza FM. Mu 2017 yatowe muri wa mugambi wa Young African Leaders aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akarisha ubwenge mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ari naho yakuye iciyumviro co gukora urubuga hwaniro. Agarutse yashinze Humuriza TV iboneka iciye ku buhinga bwa Facebook, uno mwaka naho rero akaba yatanguje urubuga hwaniro Gasape, ruboneka kuri internet co kimwe na application ija muri telephone ngendanwa. Saxe Perry avuga yuko ahanini mu bijanye n'uburyo akoresha yimenya, mu majambo yiwe akagira ati "jewe igihe cose namye ndya ikiremve ndacirasheko". Abandanya ati: "Nta muntu novuga ngo ariko aramfasha mu bijanye n'uburyo kuva ntangura runo rubuga kuko iyo mba nari mfise uburyo nari kurukora nko mu ndwi zibiri gusa." Yavuze yuko yamaze imyaka ibiri yegeranya uburyo yaba mu bijanye no kugura ama 'serveurs' canke kugura ibijanye n'umutekano kugira ntihagire abavogera urubuga rwiwe. Avuga kandi yuko mu gihe asanzwe arongoye ibitangazamakuru Humuriza FM na Humuriza TV, hari uburyo buboneka buvuye mu bamenyekanisha  ivyo bakora babicishije kuri ivyo bitangazamakuru.

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
column3: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

column2: Hari ibifungurwa bishobora kugabanya imyaka yawe yo kubaho n'ukukwononera amagara
column3: Urashobora kuvuga ubudasa buri hagati y'ibifungurwa bihingurwa buke buke n'ibindi vyaciye mu mahinguriro cane? Burya birateye ikibazo? Ijambo 'guhingura ibifungurwa'  rifise insiguro mbi muri iki gihe ca vuba, hari ivyigwa vyakozwe mu Bufaransa no muri Espagne vyerekana ko izo mfungurwa ataco zongera mu mubiri kandi zituma umuntu agabanya igihe co kubaho. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekanye ko abantu barya ibifungurwa bitegurigwa  mu mahinguriro incuro zine ku musi mu kiringo c'imyaka cumi bafise impungenge zo gupha zigera  kuri  mirongo itandatu na kabiri kw'ijana ugereranije n'abandi bafungura agace kamwe canke dukeyi ku musi. Izindi ngaruka mbi z'ibifungurwa bitekeye bikorerwa mu mahinguriro ni urugero runini rwo kugwara umutima canke uguhagara kw'umutima canke isanganya ry'udutsi dusoza ubwenge  bivuye ku ngwara y'umurindi w'amaraso urenze. Naho biruko, mu bihugu bimwe nk'Ubwongereza, abanyagihugu baronka ivyunyunyu birenga mirongo itanu kw'ijana biva ku bifungurwa bikorerwa mu mahinguriro. None twomenya gute ibifungurwa biteye ubwoba tugaheza tukamenya gafungura neza? Biragoye kumenya ibibigize rimwe na rimwe: Ibifungurwa nk'umukate n'iforomaje vyose bifatwa ko bitegurigwa mu mahinguriro ariko ntibitanga impanuka zimwe ku buzima. Igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kaminuza ya Sao Paulo muri Bresile gishira ibifungurwa mu migwi ine. Iyi migwi iva ku bifungurwa bidahingurwa gushika ku bihingurwa cane. Uyu mugwi ugizwe n'ibifungurwa bidahingurwa na gato canke bihingurwa buke buke imbere yo gufungurwa, bigizwe n'ingaburo nk'amavitamine, ivyorosha mu nda n'ivyunyunyu. Uyu mugwi ugizwe n'ivyamwa bihiye, ibibogaboga, ibiyoba, intete, ibiharage, n'ibindi bifungurwa biva mu bikoko nk'amagi, amafi n'amata. Ibifungurwa vyahinduwe gatoyi bishobora kuba vyumye, vyoroshe cane , bishuhije buke buke ,  bikanye canke   ariko bitarimwo ibirungo. Murivyo harimwo kandi ivyamwa n'ibibogaboga bibisi, ifi mbisi  n'amata akanye  bizwi neza ko bitagiramwo isukari, amata, ipiripiri hamwe n'ibiboga vyumye. Ibifungurwa bitekeshejwe ibirungo harimwo amavuta, ayavyibusha nk'ayinka, vinegeri, isukari n'umunyu. Ntibivuga ko ibifungurwa nk'ivyo biribwa ukwavyo canke ari vyinshi cane, ariko kenshi biriribwa mu mugwi w'ibindi bifungurwa. Ibifungurwa bihingurwa bigizwe kenshi n'umugwi wongerwamwo ikirungo kimwe canke bibiri. Murivyo harimwo ibibabugwa nk'inyama y'impene, ingurube, umukate, ibiyoba birimwo umunyu canke isukari, ivyamwa birimwo inzoga cankeumuvinyu. Intumbero nyamukuru yo guhingura ibifungurwa ni kwongereza ikiringo bishobora kumara canke gukomeza akanovera cavyo. Ibifungurwa bihingurwa cane kenshi na kenshi birimwo ibirungo utoshobora kwongeramwo uri muhira uriko urabitegura. Ntushobora kubimenya amazina yavyo kubera birimwo ubumara, biriko amabara, ubusose canke ibindi bibikingira. Vyinshi mu bifungurwa bihingurwa cane biribwa n'abantu baba mu mu bihugu bitunze cane kw'isi ni: Igihe cose raba inyandiko ziri  ku gifungurwa: ibirungo bitandukanye na cane cane mugihe ibintu bikoreshwa mu mahinguriro akora ibifungurwa ategerezwa kwandika ko ibifungurwa vyahinguwe cane. Urwo rwandiko rushobora kubako ibirungo vyakoreshejwe birenga nka bitanu, nk'uko bivugwa n'umwigisha wa Kaminuza Maira Bes-Rastrollo, ari mu bakoze ico cigwa. Ibirungo bitaboneka bishobora kuba bihindura akanovera k'ico  gifungurwa. Vyinshi murivyo nta ngorane bitera ariko biravugwa ko bifise ingaruka mbi. Ni ukuraba neza ivyanditseko  ko vyerekana urugero rw'ivyunyunyu bivyibusha, isukari, ko umunyu ari  mwinshi, ugereranye canke ari mukeyi. Iyi nkuru yateguwe n'igisata ca BBC kijejwe ivy'ibifungurwa.

column2: Umugambi wa UK wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda uteye kubiri 'na kamere y'Imana' - Welby
column3: Umukuru w'ishengero ry'Ubwongereza (Church of England), Justin Welby, kuri uyu wa Mungu yaneguye umugambi wa Reta y'Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda abarondera ubuhungiro. Uyu Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury avuga ko uwu mugambi "uteye kubiri na kamere y'Imana". Mu nyigisho yiwe ya Pasika, Justin Welby yavuze ko igihe c'izuka rya Yesu Kristu/Yesu Kristo atari ico "kuremeka inshingano zacu abandi". Reta ivuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka kugira bakingire ubuzima bw'abantu ntibagurishwe.l Muri uwu mugambi w'imiriyoni 120 z'amapadundi (hafi imiriyoni 157 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika)  - watangajwe muri ino ndwi - abantu bafatwa ko binjiye mu Bwongereza bidaciye mu mategeko bazotwarwa muri iki gihugu c'Urwanda, ari ho bazokwemererwa gusabira uburenganzira bwo kuja kuba muri ico gihugu. Iyi ngingo iriyamirizwa bikomeye, aho amashirahamwe atabara abatishoboye arenga 160 ariko asaba abashikiranganji guhagarika ico bita poritike "y'ubugome". Eka n'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Bwongereza na bamwe mu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera (Conservatives) baranegura iyi ngingo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku Rusengero rukuru rwa Canterbury kuri uno musi wa Mungu wa Pasika, Musenyeri Welby yavuze ko  hari "ibibazo bikomeye bitewe n'irungikwa ry'abasaba ubuhungiro mu mahanga". Yongerako ati: "Ibisigaye ni ivya poritike n'abanyaporitike. Ica ngenderwako n'uko vyoba ari vyiza mu maso y'Imana. Ariko siko bimeze. " ...kandi ntibihuye n'inshingano zacu nk'igihugu kigendera ku ndangagaciro k'aba-Kristu: kuko kuremeka abandi inshingano zacu, naho hoba ari ku gihugu kirondera ineza nk'Urwanda, ni igihushane ca kamere k'Imana, kuko yo nyene ubwayo yaremeye kwiremeka ibitunanira". Ubushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati yashigikiye uwu mugambi bufatiye ku majambo yo kunegura yavuzwe n'uyu musenyeri, bukavuga ko Ubwongereza "bwishimira kahise kabwo" ko gufasha abo bose babikeneye, kandi ko n'imigambi yo guha ubuhungiro ababukeneye wafashije ibihumbi amajana n'amajana kuronka "inzira nziza kandi zemewe n'amategeko zo kwubaka kazoza kabo". Umuvugizi w'ubwo bushikiranganji avuga ati: "Hagati aho, isi irahanzwe n'ikibazo c'abimukira ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho rero hakenewe impinduka kugira ngo abantu babi bashora abantu bareke gushira ubuzima bw'abantu mu kaga hanyuma n'ikibazo c'abarondera ubuhungiro kw'isi cananiraye gitorerwe umuti". Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko Urwanda "rutekanye" kandi ko ruzokwiga abasaba ubuhungiro hisunzwe amategeko mpuzamakungu akingira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Amasendika y'abakozi ba reta avuga ko iyi ngingo ari "iy'ubunyamaswa" ariko ko abategetsi bazotegerezwa kuyishira mu ngiro canke naho bakagenda. Ku wa kane, Ubwongereza n'Urwanda vyashize ahabona amasezerano mashasha azotuma bamwe mu barondera ubuhungiro bazoronswa gusa itike y'indege yo kugenda bakaja muri ico gihugu.
