column2: Uburyohe bw'umukate n'isoda nibwo bwatumye Phenny Awiti yemera kwipimisha umugera wa SIDA
column3: Phenny Awiti ni umunyakenya agendana umugera wa SIDA. Yagiye kumenya ko yanduye mu mwaka wa 2008 yiga mu mwaka c'icenda igihe ishirahamwe rimwe ryariko ripima uwo mugera mu banyeshure. Yemeye ko bamufata amaraso kubera iryo shirahamwe ryari ryemereye abanyeshure ko uwemera ko amufata amaraso bakamupima aca aronka umukate n'isoda. Iryo shirahamwe ryabemerera ivyo mu ntumbero yo kubahimiriza kwipimisha. Uburyohe bw'umukate n'isoda nivyo vyatumye ico gihe Phenny yemera ivyo atokwemeye. Avuga ati: "Ico gihe jewe nari nkeneye kwironkera gusa umukate n'isoda twari twemerewe. Mbere n'impanuro bampa imbere y'uko bamfata amaraso ewe nabona ko bariko bantesha umwanya, bantevya kwironkera isoda n'umukate". Haciye akanya gato gusa inyishu z'ibipimo zirasohoka, zerekana ko Phenny yari afise umugera wa SIDA. Ivyo ntaco vyamubwiye kuko wewe ico yabona muri uwo mwanya ni uko yari yironkeye umukate n'isoda, vyari nk'inzahabu ku bana bari mw'ishure ry'uburaro. Ati: " Iciyumviro c'uko mfise umugera caje kunzamwo haciye iminsi". "Ivyiyumviro bimbanye vyinshi, niho nafata ingingo y'ukubibwira mugenzanje nari nizigiye cane ko yongumiriza akabanga, ariko nticabujije ko inkuru y'uko mfise umugera ikwiragira mu kanya gato ku buryo umuntu uwa ari we wese kw'ishure yamenye ko mfise umugera". Uyo muhererezi mu muryango w'abana batandatu yagiye gutangazwa n'uko abo bavukana bari bazi ko yari afise umugera, ariko bakabigira ibanga ku mvo bavuga ko bananiwe no kumubwira. "Numvise ko ata muntu uwo ari we wese nokwizigira, nongera ndashavurira mama yamvyaye bimwe bikomeye, eka ndamwidogera. Kuko mu bana batandatu bose, ni jewe jenyene mfise umugera". Ubwo buzima Phenny yabayemwo bwatumye anenwa. Ati: "Hari igihe narwara igihute kinini ku nda cantumye ntanashobora kugendagenda. Ndabibwiye umurezi yari kw'izamu uyo munsi, yanyishuye ko adakeneye kumenya ko mfise canke ntafise umugera, ati uragenda vyanka vyakunda. Narinanase ndandara buke buke gushika mw'ishure". N'aho vyabaye ngombwa ko aza aranyegeza imiti yafata kubera yanka kumaramara mu gihe bomubona ariko afata imiti y'ugupfupfahaza (ARV), abigisha bobo ntibamworohereje. "Hari abigisha bashobora kuza mw'ishure bakabaza bati 'Phenny ni nde', hanyuma bagaca bigira... bivuga ko bari bumvise igihuha, bagashaka kumenya uwo ari we". Ni bwo buzima yabayemwo mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri yose gushika aheze amashure. Hagati aho, muri iyo myaka yose Phenny yayibayemwo mu buguruguru. "Nari umwana aciye ubwenge cane ariko nagiye kuba umuguruguru kubera ibibazo vy'umubiri n'umutima nahuye navyo mu buzima. Nari nizigiye ko ubuguruguru bwari kuntuma nkira umugera". Uko iminsi yagenda niko Phenny yagenda ashira ubwoba, aremera uko ari. Amaze kurangiza amashure yisumbuye, yarabandanije n'ibindi vyigwa, ivyo navyo bikaba vyaramufashije kwiyemera. Umugera wa SIDA wandukira uciye mu mibonano mpuzabitsina n'umuntu asanzwe awugendana, canke umuvyeyi akandukiza umwana mu kwibaruka canke mu kumwonsa, canke gukoresha ibikoresho bitobora uruhu vyakoreshejwe n'uwusanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA. Hagati aho, Phenny yarashoboye kuronka umukunzi yemeye kwubakana nawe kandi yari akomeye, n'aho bahukanye haciye imyaka mikeya . " Namenyanye nawe ndamweretswe na mugenzanje. Ambwira ko ankunda n'aho nari mfise umugera, mbere turanavyara abana babiri bose bakomeye, Faraja na Ahadi". Mama Faraja ashimangira ko atandukije abana biwe kubera bakurikije impanuro z'abaganga. Mu mwaka wa 2017 Phenny yaritangaje ko arwaye umugera wa SIDA abicishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook. Ati: "Igihe kimwe navyutse numva naruhishijwe no kwama ndiko nsigurira umwe umwe ivyerekeye amagara yanje, niho nandika ubutumwa kuri Facebook menyesha ko ngendana umugera wa SIDA. Nari mfise abagenzi 15 bonyene kuri Facebook, ariko icantangaje ni ingene ubwo butumwa bwakwiragiye hose mu kanya gato, bintuma ngira ivyiyumviro vyinshi kuri iyo ndwara. Niho naciye numva ko nkwiye kugira uruhara mu vyerekeye ukwigisha ibijanye n'umugera wa SIDA ". Aciye kuri urwo rubuga, yaciye atangura guhimiriza abantu ku vyerekeye umugera wa SIDA. Mu kwezi guheze,  mama Ahadi yarubakanye n'uwundi mukunzi, na we nyene asanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA. Phenny yatangaje abatari bake inyuma y'aho amenyeshereje ku mbuga hwaniro ko afise imbanyi kandi ko ari mu kwibaruka umwana agira gatatu. Avuga ati: "Nshaka kwereka abandi ko umuntu asanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA ashobora gusama imbanyi kandi akavyara umwana akomeye " "Imbere y'uko hanatangura kuboneka imiti y'ugupfupfahaza, mu bagore bari basanzwe bagendana umugera wa SIDA, hari bamwe bavyaye abana bakomeye, abandi nabo bakavyara abamaze kwandukizwa ...ivyo bivuga ko bivana n'urugero umugera ugezeko. Umugera wandukira igihe umaze kugera ku rugero rwo hejuru. Rero iyo umuntu asanzwe afata imiti y'ugupfupfahaza (ARV), umugera uragabanuka, gutyo umuvyeyi akanashobora kwonsa umwana wiwe ntamwanduze" Ingorane nini ni uko abantu benshi bagendana umugera wa SIDA usanga banenwa mu kibano. Phenny avuga ati: "Hari abantu benshi bibaza ko inzira yonyene y'ukwandura umugera wa SIDA ari imibonano mpuzabitsina, cane cane biciye mu bumaraya, ariko sivyo. Nka jewe nandujwe na mama. Ariko haracari abantu benshi ku mbuga bakimbwira ko mbesha, ko ahubwo nawanduye nciye mubumaraya..."

column2: South Africa: WHO iti nta cerekana ko ubwoko bushasha bwa corona bushobora kurinda urukingo
column3: Urwego rwa ONU rwitaho amagara kw'isi (OMS canke WHO) ruvuga ko ata kimenyetso kihari c'uko  ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa corona bwatowe muri Africa y'Epfo bushobora kurinda urukingo. Umukuru w'igisata c'ubuhinga muri OMS, Maria Van Kerkhove,yavuze ko abanduye umugera w'ubwosko bushasha bafise ibimenyetso vy'iyo ndwara bimeze kumwe kandi ko bidakaze. Gusa avuga ko ubwo bwoko bwongereje  ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera hafatiwe ku gitigiri umuntu umwe ashobora kwanduza. Van Kerhove yavuze ati: ''Nta kimenyetso c'uko hari ingaruka ku nkingo ziriko ziratangwa. Iyo ni inkuru nziza cane. Iyo niyo nkuru dufise gushika ubu, kandi ivyigwa biracabandanya''. Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa OMS Mike Ryan yavuze ko ubwo bwoko bushasha butahinduye uburyo uwo mugera wandukira.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Messi, Mbappe, Felix, Martinez, Ronaldo
column3: Umusatirizi wa Argentina Lionel Messi yemeye kwongereza umwaka umwe mu masezerano afitaniye na Paris St-Germain akazotuma uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 35 aguma muri uno murwi uherutse gutsindira ihiganwa ry’Ubufaransa gushika mu 2024. (Le Parisien – mu gifaransa) PSG ntizorekura umusatirizi wayo, umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w’imyaka 24, mu kwa mbere, kugira ngo izomugurishe mu ci riza ku giciro nyaco. (Ben Jacobs, Twitter) Umumenyereza wa Atletico Madrid Diego Simeone yongereje akariro ku makuru avuga ko umusatirizi wa Portugal Joao Felix w’imyaka 23 ashobora kugurishwa, mu kuvuga ko ata “n’umwe ari kibirengeye” muri uyo murwi. (Goal) Arsenal yarashatse umukinyi w’inyuma wa Argentina Lisandro Martinez w’imyaka 24 mu ci riheze, ariko akaba yashimye gusubirana n’uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Ajax  Erik ten Hag muri Manchester United. (VI iciye muri Manchester Evening News) Chelsea iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umukinyi wo hagati wa Vasco da Gama umunyabrezili Andrey Santos w’imyaka 18. (Fabrizio Romano) Manchester United iripfuza kugura umunyegori wa Aston Villa  Emiliano Martinez w’imyaka 30 yagize uruhara rudasanzwe mu gufasha Argentina gutsindira igikombe c’isi yose. (Football Insider) Iciyumviro ca Al-Nassr co guha amasezerano y'agaciro k’imiriyoni 160 z’amapawundi (yababa imiriyoni 194 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika) umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37, kirashigikiwe na reta ya Arabia Saoudite. (Ben Jacobs iciye kuri Express) Umurwi Eintracht Frankfurt wo mu Budagi  uvuga ko wari wahawe na Manchester United amahirwe yo kugura Ronaldo imbere y’uko ava i Old Trafford (ikibuga ca Man U. (DAZN iciye kuri Mail) Umumenyereza wa Barcelona Xavi yumvishije kizigenza wiwe, umunya-Espagne akina hagati Sergio Busquets w’imyaka 34 kuguma muri uno murwi gushika mu ci riza, hakwimukira mw’ihiganwa Major League Soccer ryo muri Amerika mu kwa mbere. (Sport – mu ki espagnol) Uwahoze ari umusatirizi wa Leeds United Raphinha w’imyaka 26 yakiniye Brezili inkino zitanu mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, aravugwa ko ashobora gusubira muri Premier League mu gihe yananiwe no kwiha ikibanza nyaco muri uno mwaka wa mbere w’inkino muri Barcelona. (Sport) Umumenyereza wa Arsenal  Mikel Arteta avuga ko ashobora "gukoresha umwanya w’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi wimirije" mu gihe arondera ingene yozibira igihengeri catewe n’ivunika ry’umusatirizi wa Brezili Gabriel Jesus w’imyaka 25 yavunitse mw’ivi. (Mirror)

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Shawcross, Gibbs, Martinez, Solskjaer, Klopp, Hodgson
column3: Inter Miami, umurwi wo mw'ihiganwa ryo muri Amerika Major League Soccer washinzwe na David Beckham hamwe na Phil Neville, wipfuza kugura abahoze ari abakinyi mpuzamakungu b'Ubwongereza-  Ryan Shawcross w'imyaka 33 akina hagati muri Stoke City hamwe na Kieran Gibbs w'imyaka 31 akina inyuma muri West Brom. (Sun) Manchester City igiye kuva inyuma mu ruhigi rwo kurondera kugura umusatorizi wa Inter Milan Lautaro Martinez akomoka muri Argentine mu gihe uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 23 yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A. (Eurosport) Jurgen Klopp ntiyishimiye poritike ya Liverpool ijanye no kugura abakinyi inyuma y'aho mu kwa mbere guheze uyu murwi unaniriwe no kugura umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Senegal Kalidou Koulibaly w'imyaka 29 asanzwe akina muri Napoli. (Sun) Ander Herrera kina hagati muri Paris St-Germain avuga ko amategeko ajanye no kutarenza urugero mw'ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga (Financial Fair Play) azobuza uyu murwi kugura umusatirizi wa Barcelona Lionel Messi ubu afise imyaka 33. (El Larguero via AS) Umukuru wa Bayern Munich Karl-Heinz Rummenigge avuga ko ryoba ari "iteka" ari nka hamwe boshobora kugura umukinyi Mohamed Salah wa Liverpool ariko agashimangira ko uyu murwi ata mugambi ufise wo kurondera uyo musatirizi w'imyaka 28 akomoka mu Misiri.  (ON Time Sports via Mirror) Kizigenza wa Real Madrid Sergio Ramos yanse ayandi masezerano y'imyaka ibiri akaba afise integuro yo kuja gukinira uwundi murwi wo ku mugabane wa Buraya mu gihe amasezerano n'uyu murwi wiwe azoba arangiye mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka. (Cope - in Spanish) Manchester United bizoyibera ngombwa ko irindira ihiganwa rirangire kugira ngo ishobore gutangura ibiganiro n'umumenyereza wayo, umunya Norgeve Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, amasezerani akaba azorangira mu mpera z'umwaka w'inkino wa 2021-22. (Sun) Real Madrid niyo ifise amahirwe yo gutahukana umukinyi wo kuruhande rw'i buryo inyuma wa Bayern Munich, umunya Autriche David Alaba w'imyaka 28, mu gihe Chelsea idashaka gushitsa umusharaha asaba ungana na 400.000 y'ama pawundi ku ndwi.  (ESPN) AC Milan iriteguye gutangura ibiganiro n'umusatirizi wa Suwede Zlatan Ibrahimovic w'imyaka 39 kugira ngo irabe ko yotera igikumu ku yandi masezerano yomutuma akinira uyu murwi gushika ashikanye imyaka 41. (Sun) Manchester City igiye gutangura ibiganiro n'umukinyi w'umwongereza John Stones w'imyaka 26 mu ci riza, icerekana ko afise uruhara ntangere muri uyu murwi uriko uhiganira gutahukana ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza. (Times - subscription required) Crystal Palace ntirabona neza nimba ikwiye kugiriranira ayandi masezerano mashasha n'umumenyereza Roy Hodgson w'imyaka 73 kugira abandanye amenyereza uyu murwi mu mwaka uza. Amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu ci riza.  (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Newcastle United umwongereza Dwight Gayle w'imyaka 31 ntiyishimiye ingene ataronka umwanya wo gukina, agashobora kuva muri uyu murwi mu mpera z'iri higanwa igihe amasezerano afitaniye na wo azoba arangiye.  (Chronicle) Umunyegori wa Roma w'umunya Suwede Robin Olsen w'imyaka 31 aripfuza ko yokwinjira burundi muri Everton asanzwe akinira nk'intizo. (Goal) Umumenyereza wa Manchester City Pep Guardiola ariko araraba ingene yoreka umunyegori wa Brezili Ederson 27 akaba ari we atera ya mipira yo ku metero 11 (penalty) - ni mu gihe uyu murwi umaze gutakaza penalties zitatu muri indwi bamaze kuronka muri iri higanwa ry'uwu mwaka. (Independent) Uwahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United Gary Neville avuga ko uyu murwi ukeneye kugura umukinyi wo hagati ku ruhande rw'inyuma (milieu defensif) hamwe n'uw'inyuma mu ci riza.  (Sky Sports, via Goal)

column2: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
column3: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

column2: China igabisha UK ku gico cayo c'ubwato bw'intambara ivuga ko buriko buravogera ico gihugu ca Asia
column3: Ubushinwa buragabisha umurwi w'amato w'intambara y'Ubwongereza (Carrier Strike Group), aherekejwe n'ubwato bw'intambara  HMS Queen Elizabeth, ko atohirahira ngo akore "ibikorwa bitabereye" mu gihe yinjiye mu nyanja y'Ubushinwa (Mer de Chine méridionale/ South China Sea) isanzwe iri mu mpari. "Igisirikare c'Ubushinwa kirwanira mu mazi, People's Liberation Army Navy kirameze magabo", nk'uko bivugwa na Global Times, ikinyamakuru  co mu Bushinwa cegamiye reta, gisanzwe gifatwa nk'umuvugizi w'umugambwe  Chinese Communist Party (CCP) urongoye ico gihugu. Ubushinwa bubandanya bukurikiranira hagufi aya mato y'intambara Carrier Strike Group, ubu ariko arajabuka inyanja y'Ubushinwa atera aja mu Buyapani, bukagiriza Ubwongereza ko "bucitwara nk'uko bukiri mu gihe c'ubukoloni". Igisirikare c'Ubwongereza kirwanira mu mazi, Royal Navy, kimaze igihe gikora imyimenyerezo kiri kumwe n'igisirikare kirwanira mu mazi ca Singapour, umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe kwivuna abansi akaba adahisha umugambi wo gukorera imyimenyerezo yise "Freedom of Navigation" muri iyi nyanja y'Ubushinwa. Ubushinwa bubandanya buvuga ko iki gice c'inyanja ari igice cabwo, ibiteye kubiri n'ingingo ya sentare mpuzamakungu yo mu 2016, bukaba bubandanya bwubakamwo ibigwa n'amabarabara, bimwe bikubakwa hafi y'uturere tw'inyanja twegukira ibihugu bibanyi. Amato y'intambara ya Amerika n'ayo Ubwongereza aherutse gusotora Ubushinwa kubera ivyo buvuga ko iyi nyanja ibwegukira, mu kuyicamwo n'ibigirankana. Rero ikibazo kihari ni iki: hazohava haba ibisa n'ugukozanyako bisa n'ivyabaye mu Nyanja yirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) mu kwa gatandatu igihe ubwato bw'Ubwongereza HMS Defender bwavyongwa n'indege z'intambara z'Uburusiya igihe bwaca hafi y'ikigwa giteye ibibazo ca Crimée/Crimea? Veerle Nouwens, umwe mu bashakashatsi bakuru mu kigo c'ubushakashatsi mu Bwongereza, Royal United Services Insitute (Rusi), agira ati: "Ubushinwa ntibushaka guhangana mu buryo bweruye n'incuti ikomeye ya Amerika mu nyanja y'Ubushinwa. Ariko uko vyogenda kwose, buzotegerezwa kwerekana imigambi yabwo". Mu gihe Ubwongereza bwokora imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare muri iyo nyanja, umupfasoni Nouwens abona ko dushobora kubona ivyabaye mu 2018 bisubira, igihe ubwato HMS Albion bwaca muri iyo nyanja. Bwarasugerejwe cane n'ubwato bw'intambara bw'Ubushinwa gushika ku metero 200, bubugabisha ko bwohava, mu gihe indege y'intambara y'Ubushinwa yariko igendera hafi cane hejuru y'ubu bwato bw'Ubwongereza. Ubushinwa buriko bukorera imyimenyerezo ikomeye muri ako karere muri ino ndwi, bwimenyereza kurwanira ku mweha, ivyateye ubwoba bamwe mu bihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko buriko bwitegurira gutera Taiwan. Igisirikare c'Ubushinwa kirwanira mu mazi kizofatira kuri ubu bwato bw'intambara bw'Ubwongereza mu mazi y'inyanja y'Ubushinwa "nk'akaryo ko kwimenyereza no kwiga neza ibijanye n'ubu bwato bw'intambara bwa none bw'Ubwongereza ", nk'uko ikinyamakuru Global Times kibivuga. Ariko, n'aho umuzo w'ubu bwato bw'intambara bw'Ubwongereza watumye Pekin/Beijing ishikiriza amajambo y'uburakari, umushakashatsi akorana na Rusi idharth Kaushal, avuga ko iyo bishitse hakaba icuka kibi mu bijanye n'ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu nyanja, "Ubushinwa bwibanda ku bikorwa bisanzwe bidashobora gutuma ibintu biyangara ngo habe ukurasana". Irungikwa ry'ubwato HMS Queen Elizabeth hamwe n'ubundi bubuherekeje mu buseruko bwa Aziya rifatwa nk'igikorwa ca reta y'Ubwongereza co kwongereza uruhara rwabwo mu bijanye n'umutekano kw'isi, nk'uko biri mu nteguro nshasha ya reta y'Ubwongereza mu bijanye na poritike mpuzamakungu, y'umutekano, kwivuna abansi n'iterambere. Ubufaransa, co kimwe n'ibindi bihugu vy'Ubulayi, bimaze imisi bihanze amaso iyi nyanja y'Ubushinwa mu gihe Ubushinwa buriko bwongereza inguvu za gisirikare n'ubutunzi ku muvuduko udashobora guhagarikwa. Ubushinwa buherutse gutangura umugambi wo kwongereza ibisasu vy'ubumara, mu kwubaka ikigo gishasha kizokwubakwamwo ibigega (silos) vy'ibisasu vy'ubumara mu karere ka Xinjiang kari mu misozi. Bumaze kandi igihe bukora misire zinyaruka cane zishobora gusumba umuvuduko w'ijwi kugera ku ncuro umunani , ziwe "ruhonyanganda".

column2: Mu kwahukana, Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibirezo vya 200.000$ ku kwezi
column3: Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibihumbi 200 vy’amadorari y’Abanyamerika ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana mu masezerano yo kwahukana. Uyu muraperi rurangiranwa hamwe n’icamamare ku mboneshakure bazosangira kurera abana babo bane. Kardashian yuguruje urubanza rwo kwahukana mu 2021 inyuma y’imyaka umunani abana na West yahavuye ahindura izina akitwa Ye. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho amakompanyi atari make ahagarikiye gukorana na Ye kubera ukutumvikana ku bintu bitari bike harimwo amajambo y’urwanko ku Bayahudi. Mu kwa gatatu batangarijwe ko batakari kumwe , mbere na Kardashian ariyambura izina “West” mu mazina yiwe. Ivyo kugabura amatungo be no kurera abana navyo nyene vyaratorewe umuti muri sentare nk’uko biri mu mpapuro za sentare zashizwe ahabona ku wa kabiri. Impande zompi zizoza ziravugana ku ngingo zikomeye ku vyerekeye imibereho y’abana babo, nk’uko izo mpapuro zibivuga. Amafaranga azokoreshwa ku vyerekeye umutekano n’amashure vy’abana bazoyariha bompi. Vyongeye, Ye yiteze kuriha 200.000$ ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana – kubera, nk’uko ikinyamakuru New York Post kivyandika, abana bazomara igihe kinini kwa Kardashian. Bafitaniye abana bane: North w’imyaka 9, Saint 6, Chicago 4, na Psalm 3. Mu nzandiko zitari nke yasohoye imbere y’aha, Kardashian w’imyaka 42 yavuga ko yipfuza cane ko bahukana, akongerako ko ibi “bizofasha Kanye kwemera” ko uyu mubano warangiye. Imbere y’aha, Ye w’imyaka 45 yararwanije uyu mugambi wo kwahukana. Muri ano mezi ya vuba, yarateje impari, mbere n’amakompanyi atari make aramukurako icizere, harimwo Adidas, Gap, na Balenciaga. Uyu muraperi yaraneguwe bikomeye mu ntango z’uno mwaka inyuma y’aho yitabiriye indwi yahariwe umuderi, Semaine de la mode de Paris, yambaye agapira kanditseko icivugo ngo "White Lives Matter" – amajambo akoreshwa n’abazungu babona ko ari bo basumba abandi (White Supremacy). Mu nyuma yavuze ko abamunegura bahabwa amafaranga n’akarwi k’Abayahudi gakorera mu kinyegero, amajambo asanzwe akorehwa mu kurwanya abayahudi. Mu ntango z’ino ndwi, Ye yatangaje imigambi yiwe yo kwitoreza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2024. Yaheruka kwiyamamaza mu 2020, ariko yaronse amajwi 70.000 gusa.

column2: CECAFA: Tanzania 4 - 0 Burundi, umumenyereza ati 'badusumvya ubuhinga'
column3: Mu rukino rwa kabiri rw'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'abagore mw'ihiganwa rya CECAFA, umurwi w'u Burundi ntiworohewe, kuko urukino rwarangiye utsinzwe na Tanzania ibitsindo 4-0. Umumenyereza w'uyo murwi aremera ko barushijwe, ariko akavuga ko bagiye kwikosora mu zindi nkino zimirije. Uburundi buri mu murwi B kumwe na Tanzania, Sudani y'Epfo, na Zanzibar, u Burundi buri mu kibanza ca kabiri n'amanota atatu, inyuma yo gutsinda Zanzibar ibitsindo 5-0 mu rukino rwa mbere rwabaye ku wa gatanu. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'aho u Burundi butsindiwe na Tanzania, Daniella Nibimenya, umumenyereza w'umurwi w'u Burundi, avuga ko ataco batagize. Ati: "Bakinye neza kandi bakurikije impanuro twabahaye, n'aho twatsinzwe twakinye neza". Avuga ko Tanzania yabatsinze kubera abakinyi bayo bazinanye kuko basanzwe bakinana kuva kera kandi ko babasumvya n'ubuhinga. Urwo rukino rwari rurindiriwe n'abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru benshi, na rirya abenshi mu bagize umurwi w'u Burundi harimwo abasanzwe bakina mw'ihiganwa rya Tanzania. "Twakinye aho tugeza, kandi haburana babiri hagatsinda umwe, ni ibisanzwe. Twatsinzwe uno munsi, ariko ihiganwa rirabandanya, tuzorurwana gushika ku kanyuma". Nibimenya avuga ko bagiye kwikosora kugira ngo baze bavyifatemwo neza mu nkino ziri imbere. Uburundi bwiteze guhura na Sudani y'Epfo mu rukino rutegekanijwe ejo ku wa gatatu isaha umunani mu masaha y'i Dar es Salaam. Iryo higanwa rya CECAFA ririko ribera i Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania ryatatanguye ku wa 16 z'uku kwezi rihuza imirwi umunani iva muri Uganda, Kenya, Ethiopia, Tanzania, Burundi, Djibuti Zanzibar na Sudani y'Epfo.

column2: Lionel Messi afise indoto yo gutsindira Ligue des Champions muri Paris St-Germain
column3: Lionel Messi avuga ko afise indoto yo gusubira gutsindira Ligue des Champions/Champions League inyuma y'aho ashikiye muri Paris St-Germain, akongerako ati: "Nibaza ko hano dufise umurwi ushobora kubishikako". Uyu mukinyi rurangiranwa w'imyaka 34 ari na we kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina, yatsindiye Ligue des Champions incuro zine muri Barcelona, iyo aheruka ikaba ari iyo mu 2015. PSG iracarwana ngo itahukane ku ncuro ya mbere iri higanwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Buraya, mw'ihiganwa rya 2020 ikaba yatsinzwe na Bayern Munich mu rukino rwa nyuma. Igihe yerekanwa nk'umukinyi wa PSG, Messi yavuze ati: "Intumbero n'indoto vyanje ni uko nosubira gutahukana Ligue des Champions". Messi yavuye muri Barcelona yari yinjiyemwo afise imyaka 13 inyuma y'aho uwu murwi wa La Liga unaniriwe no guha ayandi masezerano uyu mukinyi kubera inzitizi zishingiye ku mategeko ajanye n'ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga muri iryo higanwa. Nk'umwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange baranze amateka y'umupira w'amaguru, Messi yinjije ibitsindo 672 mu nkino 778 yakiniye uwu murwi rurangiranwa w'i Catalan. Yaraciye umuhigo mu gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu (Ballon d'Or) incuro zitandatu, aterura n'ibikombe 35 mu gihe cose yari amaze i Nou Camp, ariko avuga ko ubu aryohewe no gutangura ibihe bishasha mu buzima bwiwe, inyuma y'aho aviriye muri Barcelona "bigoranye". Ari i Parc des Princes (ikibuga ca PSG), yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Yari impinduka igoye cane inyuma y'igihe kirekire cane".  "Ariko maze gushika hano, numvise mfise umunezero mwinshi cane kandi ndipfuza gutangura imyimenyerezo vuba bwango. Nshaka kwihuta". "Ikintu conyene nshaka ubu ni ugutangura imyimenyerezo. Ndashaka gukorana n'abakinyi bagenzanje hamwe n'abakozi, kugira ngo ntangure iki gihe gishasha mu buzima bwanje". "Ndafise iri shaka ryo gukina. Numva ndiko ndaribwaribwa. Numva ngishaka gutsinda nk'uko nabikoze mu gihe ca mbere c'umwuga wanje". "Ndumva ko uwu murwi witeguriye kurwanira ibikombe vyose. Ni ryo hangiro ryanje, nshaka kubandanya ntera imbere ngatsindira ibikombe, iki nico catumye nza muri uno murwi". Kuzana Messi muri uno murwi usanzwe urimwo ibihangange ni intambwe ikomeye kuri PSG mu rugamba rwo kurondera kuba kw'isonga mu mupira w'amaguru i Buraya. Inyuma yo gutsindwa na Manchester City mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, mu nyuma igatakaza Ligue 1 yo mu Bufaransa yatsindiwe na Lille, PSG yaronse abakinyi bamaze gutahukana Ligue des Champions, nka Sergio Ramos, Georginio Wijnaldum na Messi. Ariko, Messi arazi neza ko, kugira ngo aterure igikombe ca Ligue des Champions ku ncuro igira gatanu, bishobora gushika agahura na Barcelona, kandi aremera ko gukina i Nou Camp yambaye umwambaro wa PSG vyoba ari ibintu "bigoye cane  kwumva". Yongerako ati: "Barcelona ni muhira kuri jewe - nabayeyo kuva ndi umwana muto kandi nahakoreye ibintu vyinshi cane. "Sinzi ko tuzohura nabo - ariko vyoba biryoshe cane gusubira i Barcelona. "Vyoba ari ibintu bigoye kwumva gukina muhira i Barcelona ndi mu wundi mwambaro ariko birashoboka, reka tuzoraba". Umuzo wa Messi ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubufaransa utumye PSG iba umwe mu mirwi ifise umurongo ukomeye cane w'abasatirizi kw'isi mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru. Uyu mukinyi agiye gukina ku ruhande rw'abasatirizi muri PSG ari kumwe n'abakinyi babiri bazimvye kurusha abandi mu bihe vyose vyabayeho, aba nabo bakaba ari Neymar bahoze bakinana muri Barcelona, hamwe na Kylian Mbappe. Umukuru wa PSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi aremeza ko kugura Messi bizotuma uwu murwi ushobora kugumana Mbappe, mu gihe amasezerano asanzwe afitaniye nawo azorangira mu 2022. Al-Khelaifi ati: "Yahora yipfuza umurwi ushobora guhiganwa, ubu ndibaza ko dufise umurwi wa mbere ukomeye cane kw'isi, rero nta citwazo ubu afise - nta kindi yokora atari kuguma hano". Avuga ku bijanye n'uko umurwi ukoresha amafaranga y'umurengera, Al-Khelaifi yongeyeko ati: "Ico mwebwe nk'abanyamakuru mukwiye kwibandako gusumba ibindi ni ukuraba iciza azaniye uno murwi hakwibanda ku bintu bibi". "Twabanje kuvugana n'abaduha amafaranga kandi twari tuzi ko dushobora kumuzana. Muri ivyo vyose, twabanje kuraba ko tutorenza urugero mw'ikoreshwa ry'amahera, kandi tuzokurikiza amategeko ngenderwako mw'ikoreshwa ryiza ry'amafaranga".

column2: Umunyamakuru akaba n'umwanditsi kuri Afrika akomeye, Pierre Pean, yapfuye
column3: Pierre Pean, umuhinga kuri Afrika akaba yaranditse n'ibitabo vyinshi yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo kuwa kane afise imyaka 81. Nk'uko bivugwa n'igitangazamakuru co mu Bufaransa, France 24, umunyamakuru Pierre Pean, umukozi w'itohoza abushitse, yibanze cane kuri Afrika, n'ibitangazamakuru. Yibanze kandi ku banyepolitike - cane cane kahise katabonwa kumwe k'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Francois Mitterrand mu gihe aba Nazi bari bacigaruriye Ubufaransa. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo tariki 25/07/2019 nk'uko umuryango wiwe wabitangarije ibiro ntaramakuru, AFP. Umuhungu wiwe w'umwanditsi Jean Gregor, yabwiye AFP ko Pierre Pean yahitanywe n'uburwayi ku bitaro vya Argenteuil mu karere ka Val-d'Oise. Ikinyamakuru co kuri internet, France Bleu, canditse ko Pierre Pean atakunda ko bamwita umunyamakuru w'itohoza. Mu matohoza yiwe yibanda ku kwerekana ukuntu ivyo atohoza canke abo atohozako bagoranye. Yavuze ko yaba ashaka gutohoza yidegemvya, ku bintu yihitiyemwo kandi ku gushaka kwiwe, ntabwirizwe canke ngo ajane narwo afatiye ku bivugwa mu bitangazamakuru canke imanza zo mu ma sentare. Yarandanitse ku Rwanda igitabo yise "Noir Fureur Blanc Menteur: Rwanda 1990-1994", igitabo kitashimwe n'ubutegetsi buriho mu Rwanda. Muri ico gitabo casohotse mu 2005, Pierre Pean ashira akabazo ku nkuru ya jenoside yo mu Rwanda ku buryo ivugwa n'ubutegetsi. Ku bw'ico gitabo, uwo mwanditsi yararezwe muri sentare n'ishirahamwe SOS Racisme, rimwagiriza "kugira uruhara mu gukwega urwanko rufatiye ku moko", kuko yanditse ko Abatutsi "bafise umuco w'ikinyoma no guhishahisha." Urwo rubanza yararutsinze.

column2: Nkundabantu : umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yari nde?
column3: Ejo ku wa gatandatu niho umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yaririmbana na mugenziwe Alfred Nyandwi,  yitaba Imana i Bujumbura. Abo baririmvyi babiri bari bagize umurwi abatari bake bari bazi nka "Alfred na Bernard", bakaba bagiye kumenyekana cane ku rukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwiswe NKUNDABANTU. Alfred ati: " Nsigaranye umubabaro udasanzwe kuko yari umugenzi twari tumaranye imyaka n'imyaka, twavuye kure dufatana urugendo rwari rutugejeje aho tugeze, none ansize ndi umwe". Abo baririmvyi bompi basanzwe bava mu miryango y'abacuraranzi ba kera, banaririmvye indirimbo zamenyekanye cane. Bernard Ndoreyicimpa, mwene Mijuriro Mathias  na Ntahonkuriyer Valerie yavutse mu 1986, avukira muri Komine Isare ku mutumba wa Gishingano uhanamiye igisagara ca Bujumbura. Co kimwe na mugenziwe Alfred, Bernard yavukiye mu muryango w'abacuraranzi bahoze mbere baririmba mu murwi w'igihugu wari uzwi nka NAKARANGA. Alfred yabwiye BBC ati: "Uretse ko turi abavyara, twempi tuva mu miryango y'abacuraranzi, kuko papa wanje yakorana na se wa Bernard muri Nakaranga, n'aho bamaze gukukuruka". Se wiwe, Mijuriro Mathias yararirimvye indirimbo abatari bake bibuka nk'izitwa "Abanywa inzoga twaragowe", "Mariya Makurata", "Akarimi", "Musore uri muhira", n'izindi. Alfred Nyandwi yabwiye BBC ko batanguye kuvuza umuziki bari hamwe mu mwaka wa 1998 mu gihe bari bahungiye mu gisagara kubera intambara z'urutavanako zari iwabo mu Gishingano. Avuga ko batanguye kuririmbira mw'ibarabara mu ntumbero yo kurondera ingene bobaho inyuma y'aho ibintu vyabo binyagiwe, n'amazu yabo akabomorwa n'intambara. Ati:  "Ariyo mpamvu twaciye dufata umwuga wo kuririmbira mw'ibarabara, tuvugiriza abantu mw'ibarabara kugira ngo baduhe udufaranga, eka mbere twaranavugiriza n'indya kugira ngo dushobore kubaho". Avuga ko babaye muri ubwo buzima mu kiringo kitari gito, gushika aho buke buke batangura kuza baraja kuvugiriza mu bunywero mu bibanza bikomakomeye vy'i Bujumbura cane cane biri ku nkengera y'ikiyaga Tanganyika, nka za Saga Plage, Petit Bassam n'ahandi. Ati: "Aho hose twavugiriza mu bubare tuvugiriza ingenzi, abantu bari mu karuhuko bakaduha udufaranga duke duke, maze tugashobora kuronka ico dutanga mu miryango yacu kuko twari tukiri abana". "Twatanguye turi nk'abantu bita aba 'mendiants', ba ntahonikora". Alfred avuga ko batanguye kwinjira muri Studio mu 2006, babifashijwemwo na Tanganyika Studio, baca bategura urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwabaye rurangiranwa biciye cane cane mu maradiyo. Urwo rukurikirane rwiswe NKUNDABANTU  rwabatumye bamenyekana cane, runabashikana mu bihugu bitari bike harimwo za DR Congo, Rwanda, Congo Brazzaville, Uganda, Kenya, Cameroun, Benin, Tchad,  Chine na  Brésil. Bernard apfuye be na mugenziwe Alfred bariko bategura gusohora urukurikirane rwabo rwa kabiri bari barahejeje gutunganya, bise BIRATANGAJE, bakaba bategura kurusohora muri uno mwaka wa 2020. Nta wuramenya icamwishe ariko Alfred avuga ko yari amaze ikiringo c'amezi umunani agendana indwara, akaba yapfuye ejo ku wa gatandatu bamutwaye kwa muganga.
